column1: Does the founder hold an advanced degree from a prestigious institution?
Has the founder previously held a C-level role at a public company?
Did the founder co-found the company with a small team?
Has the founder worked full-time at a moderate number of companies?
Does the founder have previous startup experience?
Has the founder's previous startups been acquired?
Is the founder based in California?
Does the founder have experience in financial services?
Has the founder established a strong personal brand through public speaking or media recognition?
Is the founder's educational background in a technical field?
